pkgmetadata.longdescription: Query Data in 'Microsoft Fabric' // Query data hosted in 'Microsoft Fabric'. Provides helpers to open 'DBI' connections to 'SQL' endpoints of 'Lakehouse' and 'Data Warehouse' items; submit 'Data Analysis Expressions' ('DAX') queries to semantic model datasets in 'Microsoft Fabric' and 'Power BI'; and read 'Delta Lake' tables stored in 'OneLake' ('Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2').
